Wrap

public static InternalSynopticException Wrap(java.lang.Exception e)
Create an internal exception wrapper around a Java exception. Unless the exception itself is an internal exception.

Parameters:
e - Some Java exception
Returns:
a InternalSynopticException wrapper for the Java exception
